property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ At the end of each of your turns, untap this creature. ■ Revolution 2—Whenever your opponent puts a creature in the battle zone, if you have 2 shields or less, tap that creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your water creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may draw 4 cards. ■ Revolution 2—Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, if you have 2 shields or less, you may use a card that has "shield trigger" from your hand for no cost.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature or whenever it attacks, choose a number. Until the start of your next turn, your opponent can't cast spells that cost the same as that number and your opponent's creatures that cost the same can't attack or block.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your creatures. {INVASION}-Funky Knightmare (When one of your Funky Knightmare attacks, you may put this creature from your hand onto it.) {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ After this creature attacks, put a non-evolution Funky Knightmare that costs 6 or less from your graveyard under this creature. ■ When this creature is destroyed, put all Funky Knightmares that were under this creature from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your fire creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your other creatures would battle, you may have this creature battle instead. ■ Revolution 2—If you have 2 shields or less, your opponent's creatures must attack creatures if able.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Evolution—Put on one of your nature creatures. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever your opponent puts a creature into the battle zone, you may put a non-evolution nature creature that costs the same as less than that creature from your mana zone into the battle zone. ■ Revolution 2: If you have 2 shields or less, this creature costs 5 less to summon.
